Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: G2422P
Bezel Design: 3 Sided Frameless


Display
Screen Size: 24" (23.8" Viewable)
Widescreen: Yes
Glare Screen: Anti-glare
Panel: IPS
Display Type: FHD
Adaptive Sync Technology: FreeSync Premium (AMD Adaptive Sync)
Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Viewing Angle: 178° (H) / 178° (V)
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 250 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio: DCR 100,000,000:1 (1,100:1)
Response Time: 1ms (MPRT)
Color Gamut: 86.52% Adobe RGB / 81.64% DCI-P3 / 102.58% sRGB
Display Colors: 16.7 Million
Pixel Pitch: 0.2745mm
Refresh Rate: 170 Hz
Curved Surface Screen: Flat Panel


Connectivity
Video Ports: 1 x DisplayPort 1.2a / 2 x HDMI 1.4b
Headphone: 1 x Headphone out


Power
Power Supply: External Adaptor 20V 2.25A
100 - 240 VAC, 50/60Hz


Convenience
Stand Adjustments: Tilt: -5° ~ 20°
Swivel: -45° ~ 45°
Pivot: -90° ~ 90°
Height Adjustment: 0 ~ 130 mm
VESA Compatibility - Mountable: 100 x 100mm


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions (H x W x D): 15.72" x 21.27" x 9.20" w/ stand
12.92" x 21.27" x 2.25" w/o stand
Weight: 12.35 lbs. w/ stand
5.95 lbs. w/o stand


Consumer Alert
Consumer Alert: Display Port: 1920 x 1080 (Up to 170Hz by DP overclocking)
HDMI: 1920 x 1080 (up to 144Hz)
Adobe RGB, DCI-P3 and sRGB follow CIE1976 Standard
Label: Monitor MSI 24" 170Hz IPS 1ms A.Ajustable
